faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.desc: Common questions and answers about X-Lab AI.

questions.q: What languages does X-Lab AI support?
questions.a: X-Lab AI supports Cantonese, Mandarin, English, and many other languages. The system automatically detects the language and generates accurate subtitles, with support for both Traditional and Simplified Chinese output.

questions.q: Is my data uploaded to servers?
questions.a: No. X-Lab AI runs completely offline. All video and audio files are processed locally on your device and are never uploaded to any server, ensuring your data privacy and security.
X-Lab AI supports common video formats like MP4, MOV, AVI, MKV, as well as audio formats like MP3, WAV, M4A, and more. Subtitles can be exported in SRT, VTT, and other formats.

questions.q: What are the limitations of the free version?
questions.a: The free version provides basic features including subtitle generation and export. Upgrade to Premium to unlock unlimited exports, priority processing speed, and more advanced features.

questions.q: How can I get technical support?
questions.a: You can contact us through the form on our Contact page or email hello@x-lab.ai. We will respond to your inquiry within one business day.

termsPage.label: Terms of Service
termsPage.title: Terms of Service
termsPage.desc: Terms and conditions for using X-Lab products and services.

sections.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
sections.content: By using X-Lab (the "Service"), you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to any part, please do not use our services.

sections.title: 2. Description of Service
sections.content: X-Lab provides offline AI-powered subtitle generation, meeting transcription, and related tools. All processing occurs on your local device, and we do not collect or store your media files.

sections.title: 3. License to Use
sections.content: We grant you a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable license to use the software for personal or commercial purposes in accordance with these terms.

sections.title: 4. Restrictions
sections.content: You agree not to: (a) reverse engineer, decompile, or disassemble the software; (b) circumvent any technical protection measures; (c) use the software for any unlawful purpose; (d) redistribute or resell the software.

sections.title: 5. Intellectual Property
sections.content: X-Lab and its licensors retain all right, title, and interest in and to the software and related materials, including all intellectual property rights.

sections.title: 6. Disclaimer of Warranties
sections.content: The Service is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind, either express or implied. We do not warrant that the Service will be uninterrupted, error-free, or completely secure.

sections.title: 7. Limitation of Liability
sections.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, X-Lab shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages arising out of or relating to your use or inability to use the Service.

sections.title: 8. Modifications to Terms
sections.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Your continued use of the Service constitutes acceptance of any modifications.

sections.title: 9. Governing Law
sections.content: These terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region.

sections.title: 10. Contact Us
sections.content: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at hello@x-lab.ai.

privacyPage.label: Privacy Policy
privacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPage.desc: How we handle and protect your data.

sections.title: 1. Overview
sections.content: X-Lab is committed to protecting your privacy. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect information when you use our services.

sections.title: 2. Offline-First Approach
sections.content: Our core products (X-Caption, X-Minutes) run entirely on your local device. Your videos, audio, and generated subtitles are never uploaded to our servers.

sections.title: 3. Information We Collect
sections.content: We collect minimal data to provide our services: (a) Account information: email address for license verification; (b) Usage statistics: anonymous usage patterns to improve our products; (c) Support communications: information you submit through our contact form.

sections.title: 4. Information We Don't Collect
sections.content: We do not collect, store, or access: (a) your video or audio files; (b) generated subtitles or transcripts; (c) any media content on your device.

sections.title: 5. How We Use Information
sections.content: We use collected information to: (a) provide and maintain our services; (b) process your account and license; (c) respond to support requests; (d) improve our products and services.

sections.title: 6. Data Security
sections.content: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your data. However, no method of transmission over the Internet can be guaranteed to be 100% secure.

sections.title: 7. Third-Party Services
sections.content: We may use third-party services for payment processing and analytics. These services have their own privacy policies governing their use of your information.

sections.title: 8. Your Rights
sections.content: You have the right to: (a) access your personal data; (b) correct inaccurate data; (c) request deletion of your data; (d) opt out of marketing communications.

sections.title: 9. Cookies
sections.content: Our website uses minimal cookies for essential functionality. We do not use tracking cookies or third-party advertising cookies.

sections.title: 10. Changes to This Policy
sections.content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated "Last Updated" date.

sections.title: 11. Contact Us
sections.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at hello@x-lab.ai.
